data.name: While AnduinOS is designed for local-first operation, certain features require network access to function. These connections are not used for telemetry, but they do involve communication with external servers, which is an unavoidable requirement for these services to operate and will expose your IP address.
data.value: Whilst AnduinOS is designed for local-first operation, certain features require network access to function. These connections are not used for telemetry, but they do involve communication with external servers, which is an unavoidable requirement for these services to operate and will expose your IP address.
